text: Cupertino is a small city in Silicon Valley in the U.S. state of California. According to the 2020 census, Cupertino has a population of 60,381. The headquarters of Apple Computer is in Cupertino. == Sister cities == * Copertino, Apulia, Italy * Hsinchu, Taiwan * Toyokawa, Aichi Prefecture, Japan * Bhubaneswar, India ==References== ==Other websites== * * Cupertino Courier * Cupertino Union School District * Cupertino's name and history (PDF) * Fremont Union High School District official site * Cupertino Veterans Memorial Park Category:1955 establishments in California Category:Apple Inc.
title: Cupertino, California
